componentInstanceProperties.name: masterConfig
componentInstanceProperties.value: {"data":{"dataFormat":"HierarchyJSON","dataSourceMethod":"c.returnHierarchyTop","dataUpdateMethod":"c.returnHierarchyLevels","queryJSON":{"topIdDeriveSOQL":"select id from Account where name = 'Burke Enterprises' LIMIT 1","objectLevels":[{"terminal":false,"recursive":false,"fields":[{"api":"name","role":"name","display":true},{"api":"AnnualRevenue","role":"size","display":true},{"api":"id","role":"id","display":false},{"api":"parentId","role":"parentId","display":false},{"api":"Type","role":"picklist","display":true,"measureName":"Type","measureSchemeType":"StringValue","measureScheme":{"Prospect":"violet","Customer - Direct":"purple","Customer - Channel":"blue","Channel Partner / Reseller":"green","Installation Partner":"yellow","Technology Partner":"orange","Other":"red","default":"white"}}],"objectType":"Account","objectIcon":"standard:account"},{"terminal":false,"recursive":true,"fields":[{"api":"StageName","role":"picklist","display":true,"measureName":"Type","measureSchemeType":"StringValue","measureScheme":{"Closed Lost":"red","Qualification":"orange","Needs Analysis":"yellow","Closed Won":"green","default":"white"}},{"api":"name","role":"name","display":false},{"api":"Amount","role":"size","display":true},{"api":"id","role":"id","display":false},{"api":"AccountId","role":"parentId","display":false},{"api":"CloseDate","role":"none","display":true}],"orderByField":"CloseDate","objectType":"Opportunity","objectIcon":"standard:opportunity"}],"initialLevelsToRetrieve":2,"chartType":"Hierarchy"},"primaryNodeInitialization":"None"},"panels":{"InfoPanel":{"showOnTop":true,"allowPopover":true,"objectIcons":{"Account":"standard:account","Opportunity":"standard:opportunity"}},"ChartPanel":{"Title":"","showLevelsInitial":1,"Hierarchy":{"showZoomSlider":false,"clearHighlightedPaths":true},"Selectors":{"node":{"selector":".node","appendType":"g","styleclassText":"chartText","styleclassTextShadow":"chartTextShadow"}}},"ControlPanel":{"showBanner":false,"buttonParameters":{"showtestbuttons":true,"levels":5,"levelsIncreaseOnly":true}}},"search":{"searchAction":"HighlightOpenPath","configuredAllowSearch":true}}
